items.sentence: Tom knew he couldn\'t turn to Mary for help.
Tom knows you can\'t speak French very well.
I tried to do everything you asked me to do.
No one I know can afford to eat out anymore.
Were all of your children born in Australia?
What do you want to do for our next holiday?
Tom already knows that Mary didn\'t do that.
Tom is an executive in an insurance company.
I\'ve been giving your request some thought.
It isn\'t as cold today as it was yesterday.
It looks like Tom can\'t solve that problem.
Tom got out of his car and ran to help Mary.
Tom has already been asked to do that again.
I had no idea that Tom was going to be here.
I had no idea that Tom was going to do that.
Tom hasn\'t had a pay raise for three years.
Tom had never been in a girl\'s room before.
Tom hasn\'t yet told Mary that he got fired.
Why don\'t we try and get a few hours sleep?
Let\'s meet again tomorrow at the same time.
